Greetings/La math duibh
Ciamar a tha sibh

I know that the Taira colour was a darker green when at their height of power.
And also the Takeda had a very similar if not same shade of green during their greatest era.

I have seen the colours associated with clan mons for years upon years of research into Japanese culture and history, particularly medieval history but cannot remember the sources - but if you patiently search for them you should not have too much difficulty locating them.

Dia beannaich
Gu'n ro' math agaibh
Mar sin leibh



Signed 
Bob Thompson
